title: Skin Trading
body: this would be so good to trade old rare skins on peoples accounts that they dont use

replies.body: Or just trade skind between two consensual  friends? Or even gift an owned skin to a friend because you have a better one so you wont use the other one anymore?

> [{quoted}](name=hippy,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=7ve4GEKa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-09T20:46:27.688+0000)
> trade skins between two consensual friends

Now, when you say consensual trading of skin between friends... you're still talking about the game right?

Yeah i would love it tbh. Some times i get gifted a skin my mate really wants and they have one i want. Wiuld be a great feature. Would be very happy if they added it.
I've got skins on champs I  never use. Trading would be cool.
yea most my friends who quit have awesome skins going to waste :(
